title: Trump FCC Helps Verizon Make It Harder For You To Switch Wireless Carriers
full_text: Trump FCC Helps Verizon Make It Harder For You To Switch Wireless Carriers. Last May we noted how Verizon was lobbying the Trump administration to eliminate rules making it easier to switch mobile providers (and bring your phone with you). And as usual with the pay-to-play Trump administration, the Trump FCC is tripping over itself t…. from the "preventing-fraud" dept Last May we noted how Verizon was lobbying the Trump administration to eliminate rules making it easier to switch mobile providers (and bring your phone with you). A… [+3719 chars]
